item.title: Simple suestion=how to make a server in moparscape,is a router necessery?
item.dc:creator: @Username Username
item.description:
@Username wrote:

download winrar so you can open this source http://www.megaupload.com/?d=P1UQ70RC then once you have downloaded it make a new folder and move all the data into the new folder once you have done that go to www.no-ip.com and get a no-ip you will need this if you want ppl to connect to your server once you have your no-ip go to the new folder you made and find runserver.bat once you have ran that you may login into your server using your no-ip or 127.0.0.1

any questions? no a router is not needed it makes it more difficult
